title: DAX Fridays 158: PRODUCTX - Growth rate calculations
excerpt: Did you made a good investment last year? Do you know how to calculate that using DAX? In this video I will show you how to calculate compound growth or investment grown using PRODUCTX.   Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power
